title: How good is the Skyworth S9A OLED TV? It is very hard to find reviews for their TV’s. Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Skyworth is a chinese brand that primarily targets the value market in Asia. While it can be found in North America, people there are more likely to buy mainstream brands like Samsung, LG, Vizio, etc. If you want Skyworth reviews I think it’s best to look for them in Asian tech sites and the like. They may or may not be in english.
